member.name: T:EMFSpoolfileReader.EMFPage
member.summary: Class the represents the properties of a single page of the printed document

member.name: P:EMFSpoolfileReader.EMFPage.Header
member.summary: The header information for this printed page

member.name: M:EMFSpoolfileReader.EMFPage.#ctor(System.IO.BinaryReader)
member.summary: Creates a new EMF page record from an open file stream which is proitioned at the start of the EMF record

member.name: P:EMFSpoolfileReader.EMFRecord.Type
member.summary: The type of this enhanced metafile record

member.name: T:EMFSpoolfileReader.EMFTextRecord
member.summary: Represents a text element on the printed page

member.name: P:EMFSpoolfileReader.EMFTextRecord.Text
member.summary: The text of this text element

member.name: P:EMFSpoolfileReader.EMFTextRecord.Clipped
member.summary: True if the text is clipped inside the boundary rectangle

member.name: P:EMFSpoolfileReader.EMFTextRecord.Opaque
member.summary: True if the text is surrounded by an opaque rectangle

member.name: P:EMFSpoolfileReader.EMFTextRecord.BoundaryRectangle
member.summary: The rectangle that bounds this text element

member.name: T:EMFSpoolfileReader.EMFMETAHEADER
member.summary: The EMF header record for a spooled print job

member.name: P:EMFSpoolfileReader.EMFMETAHEADER.BoundaryRect
member.summary: The boundary of the printed page (the paper dimensions)

member.name: P:EMFSpoolfileReader.EMFMETAHEADER.FrameRect
member.summary: The frame containing the print elements
member.remarks: This can be smaller than the paper size as many printers have a non-printable margin around the edge of the page

member.name: P:EMFSpoolfileReader.EMFMETAHEADER.RecordCount
member.summary: The number of EMF records that make up the printed page
member.remarks: These records describe teh text and graphical elements that make up the printed page

member.name: P:EMFSpoolfileReader.EMFMETAHEADER.FileSize
member.summary: The size of the EMR file

member.name: P:EMFSpoolfileReader.EMFMETAHEADER.PalleteEntries
member.summary: The number of colours in the page's paletter

member.name: P:EMFSpoolfileReader.EMFMETAHEADER.Description
member.summary: The description text for this EMF spool record
